short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension generates random characters for potential passwords.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension generates between two and nine (your choice) capitalized letters, lowercase letters, numbers and special characters. A fun project I made to shortcut having to create my own secure passwords. Do not share passwords with anyone, this project is for fun and entertainment only.
